title: Mouse-over help in Analysis Browser does nothing
description:
The Analysis UI has a mouse-over question mark for the acronyms shows for every stage in the analysis pipeline. Clicking on this does nothing.

I guess this on the 'todo' list?

comments.author: Stefan Matheis (steffkes)
comments.content: it's using the default title Attribute which every Browser understands and displays after a short timeout - compare it with the attached Screenshot

comments.author: Lance Norskog
comments.content: This does not work in Safari. Oh well.

comments.author: Stefan Matheis (steffkes)
comments.content: for me, this also works on safari [Version 6.0 (7536.25)] ?

comments.author: Lance Norskog
comments.content: I'm on Snow Leopard: Version 5.1.7 (6534.57.2). I do not know the versions or updates. I will close this.
